front.title: Use Cases for MPLS Function Indicators and Ancillary Data

abstract.t: This document presents a number of use cases that have a common need for encoding MPLS function indicators and ancillary data inside MPLS packets. There has been significant recent interest in extending the MPLS data plane to carry such ancillary data to address a number of use cases described in this document. The use cases described are not an exhaustive set, but rather the ones that are actively discussed by members of the IETF MPLS, PALS and DETNET working groups participating in the MPLS Open Design Team.
